fields.value: Solution to the Ecological Inference Problem: Reconstructing Individual Behavior from Aggregate Data

dsDescriptionValue.value: These data make it possible to replicate all numerical  results in Gary King (1997), A SOLUTION TO THE ECOLOGICAL INFERENCE  PROBLEM: RECONSTRUCTING INDIVIDUAL BEHAVIOR FROM AGGREGATE DATA. Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press.
